review_data.title: My favourite restaurant in Zurich!!
review_data.content: Best pizzas in the city and great service, the people working there are just amazing, we keep going back :) Perfect for any ocassion: friends, partner, family. Highly recommended!!

review_data.title: Amazing pizza in a romantic restaurant
review_data.content: Best pizza in Zurich!! Cozy and beautiful, food is delicious and the waiters are pure love :-) We come every other week and in every celebration.

review_data.title: A little italian gem. Beautiful

review_data.title: Intimate. Great food and service
